ai-anya-e1007n0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-anya-e1007n0:2_0: The first kind of burden is the first kind of burden.

ai-anya-e1007n0:7_0: When a certain fool sees the best

ai-anya-e1007n0:12_0: by a faction with the poison;
ai-anya-e1007n0:13_0: they’re led on by the world,
ai-anya-e1007n0:14_0: he took adornments and teach the King of Laṅkā,
ai-anya-e1007n0:17_0: Since the fair was lowly bound by grief,
ai-anya-e1007n0:18_0: I would ascend the air of trees.
ai-anya-e1007n0:20_0: their own good, who are always full of peace.
